title: Top 5 Typing Games to Teach Kids Fast Typing
description: Make learning to type fun! Here are the best educational games that turn typing practice into an exciting adventure for children.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
1. TypeRacer

Race cars by typing quotes. Great for competitive kids.

2. Nitro Type

Similar to TypeRacer but with more persistent progression and car unlocking.

3. Dance Mat Typing

A fun, colorful introduction to touch typing from the BBC.

4. Keybr

Not a game per se, but gamified adaptive learning that is very effective.

5. Epistory - Typing Chronicles

An adventure game where you fight enemies by typing words. Highly recommended for immersion.
